programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys: Bad Blood
programme.desc: When a Union soldier on his way home crosses paths with a family of Confederate supporters, a bloody feud erupts between neighboring families.

programme.title: Frank and Jesse
programme.desc: A Pinkerton agent pursues the James (Rob Lowe, Bill Paxton) and Younger brothers as they rob banks, stagecoaches and trains.

programme.title: Gone Are the Days
programme.desc: With his days winding down, an aging gunman sets out on a quest to perform one last good deed, hoping to save his soul.

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: Stranded settlers (Chill Wills, Lance Fuller, Cathy Downs) enter hostile territory with a wagonload of rifles.

programme.title: Ghost Town Law
programme.desc: The Rough Riders (Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, Raymond Hatton) unmask killer cowboys.

programme.title: The Ghost Rider
programme.desc: A cowboy sets out in search of a phantom outlaw terrorizing the countryside.

programme.title: Texas Terror
programme.desc: A former lawman straps on his six-shooters when he discovers the identity of his best friend's killer.

programme.title: Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: Two former Pony Express riders enter a dilapidated stagecoach in a race for a government mail contract.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights' neighbor (Franchot Tone), a former soldier and lawman, seeks security for his daughter.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Hoss' bandit uncle (Neville Brand) decides to bypass the Ponderosa, but his gang disagrees.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When two rangers arrive to help the newspaper editor of Wilcox, they find out he has been lynched and is hanging from a tree.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: Rynning hires an Apache tracker to find a gang of desperadoes committing murder and robbery across the entire Arizona Territory.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: A member of the notorious Wild Bunch bandit gang escapes from Ranger Clint Travis' custody, resulting in his being fired. Furious, Travis sets out to take on the whole gang.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Tiburcio Vasquez vows vengeance against Anglos after his sister Dolores is killed; Matt and Frankie try to stop his years of terror in Southern California after a railroad agent is killed with the help of local priest.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt enlists the aid of Dakota chiefs to bring in Crazy Horse.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit witnesses bandits robbing a bank.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: A crime situation has prevented the ratification of a new treaty with Mexico.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: El Toro must stop the spread of a deadly disease; Kit uncovers a murder scheme.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit is sent to investigate the forthcoming trial of a man accused of murder.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Daggett and Morgan steal a mining claim held by Joe Brownlow.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: A woman summons Kit to search for her missing daughter.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Bandits use a cave to store loot from holdups.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: An outlaw plans to take over a ranch and use it as a hideout for his gang.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit and El Toro (Bill Williams, Don Diamond) are held up by the Slick Ears gang.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: A woman wielding an odd pair of shears exposes herself as a murderess.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: A boss of a gang poses as an assayer in order to trick a man out of his money.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: An ex-outlaw decides that crooked politics are more profitable than crime.

programme.title: Six Gun Gospel
programme.desc: A gang hijacks shipments of gold from Goldville. Ace Benton, the town's leading citizen is trying to acquire all the town property, as he knows the railroad is planning a line through there.

programme.title: Outlaws of Stampede Pass
programme.desc: A blacksmith's daughter helps two lawmen round up a group of cattle rustlers.

programme.title: Boots and Saddles
programme.desc: A singing ranch foreman and his sidekick convince a young British nobleman to keep, rather than sell, the ranch left to him by his late father.

programme.title: Hell Town
programme.desc: A rancher (John Mack Brown) makes his cousin (John Wayne) trail boss on a cattle drive headed for trouble.
